nl.weeaboo.vn.image

Interface IScreenshot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAsyncRenderTask, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IWritableScreenshot

    public interface IScreenshot
extends IAsyncRenderTask
    Wrapper object for screenshot operations. Since screenshots can only be taken during rendering, it may take several frames for a scheduled screenshot to become available.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITextureData getPixels()
      Warning: May return null if the screenshot is not yet available or volatile.
      nl.weeaboo.common.Dim getScreenSize() 
      short getZ()
      The Z-index at which this screenshot will be, or was, taken.
      boolean isTransient()
      Returns whether this screenshot is transient.
      boolean isVolatile()
      A volatile screenshot only stores its pixels on the GPU.
      void makeTransient()
      Deprecated. 
      Deprecated since NVList 4.0
      void markTransient()
      Marks this screenshot object as transient; its pixels won't be serialized.

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.weeaboo.vn.render.IAsyncRenderTask

        cancel, isAvailable, isFailed

    • Method Detail

      • markTransient

        void markTransient()
        Marks this screenshot object as transient; its pixels won't be serialized.

      • makeTransient

        @Deprecated
void makeTransient()
        Deprecated. Deprecated since NVList 4.0

      • isVolatile

        boolean isVolatile()
        A volatile screenshot only stores its pixels on the GPU. As a consequence, it may lose its pixels at any time.

      • isTransient

        boolean isTransient()
        Returns whether this screenshot is transient.
        Specified by:
        isTransient in interface IAsyncRenderTask
        Returns:
        true if the render result is omitted when saving. If false, the render result (if available) will be stored as part of save files.
        See Also:
        markTransient()

      • getScreenSize

        nl.weeaboo.common.Dim getScreenSize()
        Returns:
        The screen size in pixels when this screenshot was taken.

      • getZ

        short getZ()
        The Z-index at which this screenshot will be, or was, taken.
        See Also:
        IVisualElement.getZ()

      • getPixels

        ITextureData getPixels()
        Warning: May return null if the screenshot is not yet available or volatile.
